Player History
Drafted in 34th round, 542nd overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Injured on 6/17/2015 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 7-8 weeks...
Injured on 5/4/2018 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/5/2018 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/24/2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/29/2019, off Saul Trejo (KC)...
Traded from Houston to Detroit on 5/11/2020 (Going to HOU: 2B James Goodridge, 3B James Truman. Going to DET: P Rodney Schloss)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2021, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,614,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Detroit to Cincinnati on 2/3/2022 (Going to DET: 3B Edward Clinard, 3B Cedrick Fernandez, P Deangelo Montejano, CF Andrew Ruggles, P Thurman Brawley. Going to CIN: P Rodney Schloss)...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,857,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/10/2023 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Traded from Cincinnati to New York on 4/21/2023 (Going to CIN: RF Michael Bitner, CF Stephen Washington, P Roman Kindle, LF Jason Domingo. Going to NY: P Rodney Schloss, P Ernest Ellis)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2023, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,857,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2024, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
10/20/2024: Signed a contract extension with New York , $14,500,000 per year, for 4 years.
Injured on 5/26/2025 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2025, going 4-0, 1.43...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2026, going 2-0, 1.31...
Traded from New York to St. Louis (C) on 2/6/2027 (Going to NY: P Horacio Testa, P Dean Wales, P Derek Rios, C Dennis Gore, LF Curtis Donovan. Going to STL: P Rodney Schloss, P Emanuel Pardo,
C Steven Winer)...
Was selected to the 2027 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2027, going 2-1, 0.55...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2027...
Was selected to the 2028 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/2/2029 to a 4-year deal worth $19,321,000 per year...
